existing_features.title: Update the next-prayer countdown logic so the remaining time is computed and updated every second (instead of every minute) and formatted with seconds for display as mm:ss (and as HH:mm:ss when the remaining time is 1 hour or more).

Ensure the AndroidPush payload field `timeRemaining` receives the same seconds-inclusive countdown string so the Android persistent notification can display seconds-based countdown (mm:ss / HH:mm:ss).

Keep existing bridge update behavior for next-prayer identity (name and timestamp/time-string) so that Android bridge calls that should only happen on next-prayer changes are not spammed by the new per-second countdown updates.

new_feature_requests.summary: Kalıcı bildirimdeki kalan vakit geri sayımı dakika yerine saniyeleri de gösterecek şekilde güncellensin (mm:ss).
